tasks.label: Build(Debug)
tasks.command: case ${file} in *.py) stickytape ${file} --add-python-path libpy > res/submit.py ;; *) source tool/build.sh ${relativeFile} ;; esac

tasks.label: Build(Release)
tasks.command: case ${file} in *.py) stickytape ${file} --add-python-path libpy > res/submit.py ;; *) source tool/build.sh ${relativeFile} R ;; esac

tasks.label: Run
tasks.command: ulimit -s 1048576 && case ${file} in *.py) python3 ${file} < test/tc/in ;; *) res/a.out<test/tc/in ;; esac
